name: Decision Matrix Analysis
description: Systematic approach to comparing multiple options against weighted criteria to make data-driven decisions

structure.name: Options Identification
structure.description: List all viable alternatives being considered

structure.name: Criteria Definition
structure.description: Define the evaluation criteria that matter for this decision

structure.name: Criteria Weighting
structure.description: Assign relative importance weights to each criterion

structure.name: Option Scoring
structure.description: Score each option against each criterion using consistent scale

structure.name: Weighted Analysis
structure.description: Calculate weighted scores and analyze the results

structure.name: Sensitivity Analysis
structure.description: Test how changes in weights affect the recommendation

prompts: What are all viable options we're considering for this decision?
What criteria should we use to evaluate these options?
How important is each criterion relative to others? (assign weights)
How does each option perform against each criterion? (score 1-10)
What do the weighted scores tell us about the best option?
How sensitive is our recommendation to weight changes?
Are there any qualitative factors not captured in our scoring?
when_not_to_use: Decisions with only two clear options
Situations where criteria cannot be clearly defined

examples.title: Cloud Provider Selection
examples.description: Comparing AWS, Azure, and GCP using criteria like cost, performance, compliance, and vendor lock-in

examples.title: Software Tool Evaluation
examples.description: Choosing between project management tools based on features, pricing, integration, and team adoption

examples.title: Office Location Decision
examples.description: Evaluating office locations using cost, accessibility, talent pool, and company culture fit criteria

validation_status.validation_notes: Standard approach for multi-criteria decision making in business and engineering

prerequisites: Clear decision criteria that can be measured or evaluated
Time for thorough analysis and scoring
